<sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-25 00:46:14</sys_updated_on> <value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) { try { var LOGGER = new sn_va_teams.VAMSTeamsLogger('VAMSTeamsAdapterSenderPrepareInputs'); LOGGER.debug("[MS Teams Adapter Sender Prepare Inputs] Inputs :" + JSON.stringify(inputs));
var teamsUtil = new sn_va_teams.VAMicrosoftTeamsUtil();
// prepare payload var inputPayload = inputs['payload']; var inputPayloadJson;
if (inputPayload && inputPayload['requestData']) { inputPayloadJson = JSON.stringify(inputPayload['requestData']); }
// prepare results var inputResults = inputs['results']; var transformedResults = []; var inputAttachment = []; var inputResultJson; var messageID; var inputJsonArr = []; var summaries = []; var firstSummary;
if (inputResults) { // when subflow is being called directly, the results come in an other key 'results', i.e., results : {results : [{},{},....]} if (Array.isArray(inputResults['results']) && inputResults['results'].length) { inputResults = inputResults['results']; }
if (Array.isArray(inputResults) && inputResults.length) { inputResults.forEach(function(inputResult) { try { if (!teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(inputResult)) { inputResultJson = inputResult['result']; // string
/* Making changes to message processing as part of story STRY53200370. Prior to implementation of the story the message that is being sent out was part of attachement section. Now with adaptive card changes we can create an array of attachements from inputResults JSON and pass multiple messages in a single request. */
messageID = inputResult['messageId'] var inputResultJsonParse = JSON.parse(inputResultJson); var hasActionButtons = teamsUtil.hasActionButtons(inputResultJsonParse.attachments); var isLiveAgentCard = teamsUtil.isLiveAgentFeedbackMsg(inputResultJsonParse.attachments, hasActionButtons); if (!teamsUtil.isBatchingEnabled() || inputResultJsonParse.attachmentLayout == "carousel" || isLiveAgentCard || (teamsUtil.isBatchingEnabled() && !teamsUtil.isPickerBatchingEnabled() && teamsUtil.isPicker(inputResultJsonParse.attachments))) { //exclude carousel, live agent card or don't batch when flag is set // inputJsonArr.push(inputResultJson); inputAttachment.push(inputResultJsonParse.attachments); summaries.push(inputResultJsonParse.summary); } else { inputJsonArr[0] = inputResultJson; var firstAttach = inputAttachment[0] == null ? [] : inputAttachment[0]; firstAttach = firstAttach.concat(inputResultJsonParse.attachments); inputAttachment[0] = firstAttach; summaries[0] = summaries[0] ? summaries[0] : inputResultJsonParse.summary; } } } catch (e) { LOGGER.error("[MS Teams Adapter Sender Prepare Inputs] Error in converting string to MS Out : " + e.message); } }); } }
for (var i = 0; i < inputJsonArr.length; i++) { appendResults(inputJsonArr[i], inputAttachment[i], summaries[i]); }
outputs['payload'] = inputPayloadJson || '{}'; outputs['result_array'] = transformedResults;
LOGGER.debug("[MS Teams Adapter Sender Prepare Inputs] Outputs : " + JSON.stringify(outputs));
} catch (e) { outputs['result_array'] = []; outputs['payload'] = '{}';
LOGGER.error("[MS Teams Adapter Sender Prepare Inputs] Error : " + e.message); }
function appendResults(fullJson, attachments, summary) { var msOut = teamsUtil.transformOutboundMsgToMSOut(fullJson, attachments, summary); // object
var outputResult = {}; outputResult['ms_out_str'] = JSON.stringify(msOut); outputResult['cs_message_id'] = messageID || '';
transformedResults.push(outputResult); } })(inputs, outputs);</value> <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable> </sys_variable_value> <sys_variable_value <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-25 00:46:16</sys_updated_on> <value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) { try { var LOGGER = new sn_va_teams.VAMSTeamsLogger('VAMSTeamsAdapterSenderPrepareInputs'); LOGGER.debug("[MS Teams Adapter Sender Prepare Inputs] Inputs :" + JSON.stringify(inputs));
var teamsUtil = new sn_va_teams.VAMicrosoftTeamsUtil();
// prepare payload var inputPayload = inputs['payload']; var inputPayloadJson;
if (inputPayload && inputPayload['requestData']) { inputPayloadJson = JSON.stringify(inputPayload['requestData']); }
// prepare results var inputResults = inputs['results']; var transformedResults = []; var inputAttachment = []; var inputResultJson; var messageID; var inputJsonArr = []; var summaries = []; var firstSummary;
if (inputResults) { // when subflow is being called directly, the results come in an other key 'results', i.e., results : {results : [{},{},....]} if (Array.isArray(inputResults['results']) && inputResults['results'].length) { inputResults = inputResults['results']; }
if (Array.isArray(inputResults) && inputResults.length) { inputResults.forEach(function(inputResult) { try { if (!teamsUtil.isEmptyObject(inputResult)) { inputResultJson = inputResult['result']; // string
/* Making changes to message processing as part of story STRY53200370. Prior to implementation of the story the message that is being sent out was part of attachement section. Now with adaptive card changes we can create an array of attachements from inputResults JSON and pass multiple messages in a single request. */
messageID = inputResult['messageId'] var inputResultJsonParse = JSON.parse(inputResultJson); var hasActionButtons = teamsUtil.hasActionButtons(inputResultJsonParse.attachments); var isLiveAgentCard = teamsUtil.isLiveAgentFeedbackMsg(inputResultJsonParse.attachments, hasActionButtons); if (!teamsUtil.isBatchingEnabled() || inputResultJsonParse.attachmentLayout == "carousel" || isLiveAgentCard || (teamsUtil.isBatchingEnabled() && !teamsUtil.isPickerBatchingEnabled() && teamsUtil.isPicker(inputResultJsonParse.attachments))) { //exclude carousel, live agent card or don't batch when flag is set // inputJsonArr.push(inputResultJson); inputAttachment.push(inputResultJsonParse.attachments); summaries.push(inputResultJsonParse.summary); } else { inputJsonArr[0] = inputResultJson; var firstAttach = inputAttachment[0] == null ?
